summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4734 for the improvement of the alley in block 127, A.A. Denny's Broadway Addition, being the alley between Summit Avenue and Boylston Avenue, from Seneca Street to University Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54762, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
